SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_teacher.* FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id WHERE tb_user.uname = #uname# AND tb_user.password = #password# AND tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 2
SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.*,tb_class.imei, FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id LEFT JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_student.class_id WHERE tb_class.id = #classId#
SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.* FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id LEFT JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_student.class_id WHERE tb_class.mac = #mac#
SELECT tb_user.* ,tb_student.*,tb_device.imei FROM tb_user LEFT JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id LEFT JOIN tb_device ON tb_student.device_id = tb_device.id WHERE tb_device.imei=#imei#

SELECT tb_user.id,tb_user.uname,tb_user.name,tb_user.email,tb_user.sex,is_active,role,tb_user.ctime, tb_school.id AS schoolId,tb_school.name AS schoolName,idcard,tb_teacher.phone AS phone FROM tb_user INNER JOIN tb_teacher ON tb_user.id = tb_teacher.id INNER JOIN tb_school ON tb_teacher.school_id = tb_school.id WHERE tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 2 ORDER BY tb_user.id

SELECT tb_user.id,tb_user.name,tb_user.sex,tb_user.ctime,tb_student.guardian,tb_class.name AS className, tb_school.id AS schoolId,tb_school.name AS schoolName,tb_student.phone,tb_student.address FROM tb_user INNER JOIN tb_student ON tb_user.id = tb_student.id INNER JOIN tb_class ON tb_student.class_id = tb_class.id INNER JOIN tb_school ON tb_class.school_id = tb_school.id WHERE tb_user.is_Active = 1 AND tb_user.role = 3 ORDER BY tb_user.id
